root.name: Star Wars: Galaxies - Starter Kit
root.description: This kit contained not only the original game, Star Wars: Galaxies, but also the expansion packs An Empire Divided and Jump to Lightspeed. Players who bought this starter kit also received an X-Wing and TIE Fighter instant transport vehicle as an in-game gift.Â
